title: FIX COMPUTER CUBE
description: Petition to make Greg fix the Computer Cube. I'm done with Broken BS!

replies.body:
Patience young one. When the rewrite for 1.7 finishes, the GTCC may again see the light of day.

Until then, angry messages will not make progress.
As a reminder, all 1.6 GregTech development came to an end ten days ago.  If you wished to make such a petition (in a calmer tone), you should have done so 2 weeks ago.
Ah, just as well, I'm gonna find me a Reactor Sim, even if it must be online.
